**Apes Together Strong** ü¶ç

Yuga Labs has come to Telegram, and we are happy to welcome their official BAYC collection ü¶ç

BAYC, a pioneer in Web3, was one of the first NFT collections to make [ownership decentralized](https://yuga.com/about). Each BAYC holder can leverage this utility by creating their own art from their NFT, including sticker packs

To make this clear, we have separated the Official BAYC Collection by Yuga Labs and Stickers by BAYC NFT Holders, which includes Animoca, Ape Accelerator, and others
